content: 3 single_crochet scblo x 8 single_crochet slip_stitch in next 2 s cid 415 tches on hat turn 10 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch row 4-66 repeat row 2 & 3 slip_stitch last row to free loops of star cid 415 ng chain in row 1 fasten_off finishing create puff ball sew to top of hat weave in all ends
